step1.para: Install wheel chocks
Remove front drive shaft and support second shaft if applicable
Disconnect wiring harness from transmission. Includes cut tie straps when required
Disconnect clutch pedal linkage at transmission
Disconnect shifter assembly at tower and secure out of way
Remove lower clutch housing inspection cover, include disconnect grease tube from cover
Remove bolts retaining transmission to engine, all but two
Disconnect exhaust system at turbocharger when required
Install transmission jack to transmission and secure
Remove remaining bolts retaining transmission to engine
Remove manual transmission assembly
Check clutch assembly alignment
Install manual transmission assembly
Install bolts retaining transmission to engine and torque bolts to spec., Includes remove transmission jack
Connect exhaust system at turbocharger when required
Install lower clutch housing inspection cover, includes connect grease tube
Connect shifter assembly at tower
Connect clutch pedal linkage at transmission
Adjust clutch if necessary
Connect wiring harness at transmission. Includes secure with tie straps as necessary
Install front drive shaft and torque to spec.
Remove wheel chocks
